title.narrative: 3.3.1. INSTITUTIONAL FRAMEWORK & DATA

description.narrative: By the end of 2015, the institutional framework for implementing and monitoring child protection measures is strengthened, which contributes to Access To Justice, Child Protection â€“ General, Justice For Children, Prevention And Response Services For Violence Against Children, Violence, Exploitation And Abuse. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Advocacy And Public Engagement, Evaluations, Research And Data, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: By the end of 2015, children are better protected against exclusion, violence, abuse, and exploitation through a strengthened child protection system.

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: By the end of 2015, the institutional framework for implementing and monitoring child protection measures is strengthened

description.narrative: In 2016, Cote d'Ivoire has a National Child Protection Policy and a National Child Justice Policy. The challenge now is for UNICEF CDI to support the implementation of these policies in target areas and measure the achievements for children and families in a more systematic manner. | Status:On-track | As-of Date:23/01/2017

title.narrative: Routine data collection system for social welfare service is updated and launched

target.value: 2015:Routine data collection system updated and launched

actual.value: 2017:CP indicators have been developed and a consultant hired to harmonize the GBV, CP and OEV databases

title.narrative: Coordination mechanisms planned by the National Child Protection Policy are in place

baseline.value: Coordinating mechanisms not put in place

actual.value: 2017:The coordination mechanism to guide implementation of the National Child Protection Policy is still not fully in place or functional. The Decree has now been signed to set up the national committee.

title.narrative: (NOT VALID after Dec 31 2017) Existence of procedures and services for children in contact with law that are applied and delivered in line with international norms

actual.value: 2017:Procedures and services for children in contact in law in line with international norms are available and implemented in 4 court (11% of the courts of the country)
